There is no direct bus from Mysore to Somanathapura, the best is to take a bus from Mysore to T.Narasipura and then another bus to Somanathapura.
There are plenty of taxi at T.Narasipura opposite to bus stand. It will cost you around Rs. 250 to hire a taxi for a round trip to the temple.

value: price=Rs. 100 for  foreigner entrance, 5 for Indian
content=Temple built by the Hoysala dynasty in 1268 CE. This temple dedicated to Vishnu (Keshava) is no longer in activity. There are excellent stone sculptures of several Hindu god and goddesses

Food and water has to be carried since there are not very good restaurants
